Story

After finishing graduate studies in Colorado I led product design at Final while going through Techstars. After Final, I joined Uber and currently work on the consumer-facing rider app. We're hiring.

I get giddy about platform design, motion details, and prototyping in code. At night, you can find me tinkering with VR.

Tools

  • After Effects
  • Unity
  • HTML/CSS/JS
  • Sketch/PS/AI
